string.text: NPC: Hi there! I am an Aserai Archer. You can call me Cowthief
NPC: I live in the southern desert lands of Calradia
NPC: I follow the sultan Unqid with footmen and horsemen in battle.
NPC: I have a medium-sized mustache. My traits are calculating, but generous.
NPC: I can shoot arrows at people. That is all I can do
NPC: Hi there! I am a Battanian Highborn Warrior. You can call me Blade
NPC: I follow the King Caladog
NPC: My people are famed for their marksmanship as archers throughout Calradia.
NPC: However, I am just good with my sword.
NPC: I can fight good with my sword. My preferred strategy is to fake out my opponents with my attacks and attack them when they are the most vulnerable.
